job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>Immediate need for a talented&nbsp;<strong>Site Reliability Engineer.</strong>&nbsp;This is a&nbsp;<strong>Contract to Hire (FTE) </strong>employment&nbsp;opportunity and is&nbsp;in <strong>Atlanta, GA (Initially Remote).</strong>&nbsp;Please review the job description below:</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Top Must Have: </strong>AWS, some software development experience, some Linux experience.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>What you will do: </strong></p><p>- Automate anything and everything! (Infrastructure build out, testing, deploying, monitoring, etc)</p><p>- Design and assist in the authoring of software tools that reliably manage application delivery</p><p>- Design and assist in the setup and maintenance of application monitoring and alerting</p><p>- Engage with Development/Capability Teams to ensure best practices are implemented</p><p>- Improve predictability and reliability of software releases, workflows and operating software.</p><p>- Reduce application deployment windows by leading company towards a Continuous Deployment environment</p><p>- Reduce mean time to recovery (MTTR) by helping troubleshoot, monitor, alert, and automating recovery.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>The skills we require: </strong></p><p>- Python, Ruby, Go or other systems programming (moderate skills required)</p><p>- Experience with configuration management systems (Octopus, Chef, Puppet)</p><p>- Experience rolling out redundant, mission-critical applications in a highly available production environment</p><p>- Experience with version control systems (Git or SVN)</p><p>- Experience with Cloud Computing platforms (Amazon AWS, Kubernetes, Heroku, etc)</p><p>- Experience with continuous integration tools (Jenkins, CircleCI, etc), Artifactory (or Nexus)</p><p>- Excellent written communication, problem solving, and process management skills</p><p>- Desire to work in a fast paced, evolving, growing, dynamic environment</p><p><br></p><p><strong>The skills we prefer: </strong></p><p>- Linux system engineering expertise</p><p>- VMWare, VirtualBox experience.</p><p>- Experience supporting Ruby or Java applications</p><p>- Experience supporting Database Server infrastructure (MySQL, Postgres, etc)</p><p>- Networking Knowledge</p><p>- Experience with Hashicorp tools (Vagrant, Terraform, Packer, etc), Linux Containers (docker, rocket)</p><p>- Experience with Java build tools such as Ant, Maven, Gant, or Gradle</p><p>- Experience with agile development, continuous integration and automated testing</p>
